titleStmt.title: Bentivolio and Urania in four bookes / by N.I. D.D.
titleStmt.author: Ingelo, Nathaniel, 1621?-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for Richard Marriot, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
With: Bentivolio and Urania, the second part, in two books / by Nath. Ingelo. London : printed by J. Grismond for Richard Marriott, 1664 (Wing I179).
